name: @reflexer-finance/geb
description: Javascript client for GEB reflex indexes.

scripts.api-codegen: npm run codegen --prefix packages/geb-contract-api && npm run codegen --prefix packages/geb-admin-api && prettier --write packages/*/*/*.json packages/*/src/generated/*.ts && git apply packages/geb-contract-api/src/patches/*.patch
scripts.test-all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run bootstrap && npm run test-node Test
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run bootstrap
scripts.docs: rm -rf docs && typedoc --options typedoc.json && node scripts/process_docs.js
scripts.docs-publish: npm run docs && git clone git@github.com:reflexer-labs/geb-docs.git && cp -r docs/* geb-docs/geb-js && cd geb-docs && git add -A && git commit -m'Update geb.js docs...' && git push && cd .. && rm -rf geb-docs

author: Guillaume Felley <guillaume@reflexer.finance>
